hero.title: Experience the ultimate assassination game
hero.description:
A real-time multiplayer assassination game without a game master. Each player receives a secret target and must eliminate them by completing creative missions. The last player standing wins, or the one with the most eliminations when time runs out!

Choose from a variety of missions, adapt your strategy, and eliminate your targets discreetly. Will you be the ultimate assassin?
